summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Teacher and Parent Dashboard features. Fixed critical MongoDB ObjectId serialization bug in classroom creation endpoint. All 28 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI testing confirms both dashboards are fully functional with all features working correctly.

fixed.issue: MongoDB ObjectId not JSON serializable - causing 500 error
fixed.fix: Added classroom_doc.pop('_id', None) before returning response

passed_tests: ✅ Teacher Dashboard - Access control (only teachers can access)
✅ Teacher Dashboard - View classroom details with students and challenges
✅ Teacher Dashboard - Create challenges for classroom
✅ Parent Dashboard - Access control (only parents can access)
✅ Parent Dashboard - Create chores for children
✅ Parent Dashboard - Give money to child
✅ Dashboard role-based navigation - Teacher sees teacher dashboard link
✅ Dashboard role-based navigation - Parent sees parent dashboard link
✅ UI - Teacher Dashboard loads with all components
✅ UI - Parent Dashboard loads with all components
seed_data_creation: Created test users (teacher, parent, child) with sessions for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Teacher and Parent Dashboard features are fully implemented and tested. All backend APIs work correctly. Frontend UI components are functional. The MongoDB ObjectId serialization bug was fixed in the classroom creation endpoint. Test users created in database can be reused for future testing.
